title: Mexico : number of households 2005 to 2017
summary: Overall Number of households in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of households in millions is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2015.
The highest Number of households in millions, of value 32.9 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Number of households in millions, of value 24.8 was reported at Year 2005
